label: Project
comment: An endeavour carefully planned to achieve a unique product, service, or other particular aim such as a construction project.

datatypeProperties.comment: The monetary value of the net budget for this procuring project.
The monetary value of the total budget which includes net amount, taxes, and material and instalment costs for this procuring project.
A code specifying the type of sub works, such as land surveying or information technology consulting, for this procuring project.
A code specifying the type of work, such as surveying or consulting, for this procuring project.
The indication of whether or not the project is constrained by an authority such as the World Trade Organization (WTO) for this procuring project.

referencedBy.comment: The procuring project specified for this header trade agreement.
A mission project program for this line trade agreement.
